summary: This is a legal motion filed by Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team seeking to strike surplusage from the superseding indictment in her criminal case. The document is a notice of motion submitted to the United States District Court for the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant in the criminal case (20 Cr. 330) who is moving to strike surplusage from the superseding indictment.

persons.name: Mark S. Cohen
persons.context: Attorney from Cohen & Gresser LLP who signed the motion on behalf of Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Filing of Motion to Strike Surplusage
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team files a motion to strike surplusage from the superseding indictment in her criminal case.

locations: United States District Court Southern District of New York
800 Third Avenue, 21st Floor, New York, NY 10022
33 West 19th Street - 4th Floor, New York, NY 10011
keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team filed a motion to strike surplusage from the superseding indictment in her criminal case (20 Cr. 330).
The motion was filed on January 25, 2021, in the United States District Court for the Southern District of New York.
Maxwell was represented by multiple law firms including Cohen & Gresser LLP, Haddon, Morgan & Foreman P.C., and the Law Offices of Bobbi C. Stemheim.
The document shows Maxwell's legal team actively challenging the language and scope of the indictment against her.
This is identified as Pretrial Motion #6 in Maxwell's criminal case.
